Package cen3024c

Class ConfirmBox

java.lang.Object
cen3024c.ConfirmBox
public class ConfirmBox extends Object
Created with guidance from TheNewBoston JavaFX tutorial, this class creates a confirmation box for a user to confirm their action.
Version:
07/07/2022
Author:
Stephen Sturges Jr

  • Method Details

    • display

      public static boolean display(String title, String message)
      Displays a confirmation box with window title and displaying the input message to the user with yes and no buttons.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the confirmation box window.
      message - The message to be displayed to the user.
      Returns:
      boolean true (Yes) or false (No).
